events.name: The Official Part
events.description:
In addition to speeches by the Rector and the President of PF the official part includes the awarding of academic honors.

Professor Thomas Lars Andresen, DTU Nanotech, will give a talk on the use of nanotechnology to combat diseases and the art of programming in chemical codes.

The program alternates with musical performances by soloist Stine Louise Henriksen and conductor Andreas Vetö.

Ticket information: Admission is free, but there is limited seating.

The doors will be closed at 16:50 or when the hall is full.

If you require translation, headsets are available free of charge. For more information, please ask the staff standing at the sides of the hall near the headsets.
events.danishDescription:
Udover taler af rektor og af formanden for PF indeholder den officielle del uddeling af akademiske hædersbevisninger.

Professor Thomas Lars Andresen, DTU Nanotech, holder festforedrag om brugen af nanoteknologi til bekæmpelse af sygdomme samt kunsten at programmere i kemiske koder.

Programmet veksler med musikalske indslag ved solist Stine Louise Henriksen og kapelmester Andreas Vetö.

Billetinfo: Der er gratis entré, men et begrænset antal pladser.

Dørene lukkes senest 16.50 eller når den maksimale personbelastning er nået.

events.name: Les Lanciers
events.description:
Les Lanciers is danced several times during the evening, both in the Hall and in the Tent.

Les Lanciers is a Square, or a Quadrille, which is the term for a set dance performed by four couples. It is a composite dance made up of five figures of tours, each performed four times so that all couples will dance the lead part. We find Les Lanciers in many variants in several countries, though its popularity waned at the beginning of the twentieth century. It has survived as a popular dance only in Denmark, where it has now been danced in an unbroken tradition of almost 140 years, with its own distinctive music and choreography.

In Denmark, Les Lanciers is danced at court, at many university and school graduations, and at countless private functions. Les Lanciers is also taught in most Danish high schools.

The five tours of the Danish dance are: La Dorset, La Victoria, Les Moulinets, Les Visites, Les Lanciers. 

Introductory dance classes are available before the Commemoration Party, if Les Lanciers is a new acquaintance or if you just like to refresh your steps.
Classes (in English) in Les Lanciers in the Oticon Hall Tuesday May 6th (at 16.30) and Thursday May 8th (at 17.15). Free access.
events.danishDescription:
Lanciers bliver danset flere gange i løbet af aftenen, både i Hallen og Teltet.

Les Lanciers danses i en kvadrille, d.v.s. som en dans udført af 4 par. Les Lanciers er en sammensmeltning af en række kontradanse til én dansesuite, med 5 ture i alt. Les Lanciers findes mange forskellige steder i mange forskellige afskygninger, men dansens poplaritet faldt i begyndelsen af det 20. århundrede I Danmark har dansen overlevet i 140 år med sin egen musik og koreografi.

I Danmark danses Les Lanciers ved hoffet, ved mange universiteter og gymnasier og private fester.

Les lanciers består af fem ture:La Dorset, La Victoria; også kendt som komplimentturen, Les Moulinets; også kendt som damemøllen, Les Visites; også kendt som visitturen, Les Lanciers, også kendt som herremøllen

En hurtig opfriskning af dansen kan klares (på engelsk) i Oticon Salen tirsdag 6. maj (kl. 16:30) og torsdag 8. maj (17:15). Gratis entré.

events.name: Carpark North
events.description:
Carpark North is probably Denmark's best and most energetic electro-rockband. Carpark North offers powerful, catchy and present numbers from three very thorough records, the latest of which is called 'Grateful'. Most of you probably do not remember when Carpark North kicked the door in to the Danish music scene with the hit 'Transparent And Glasslike' back in 2003, but they have been part of the Danish music scene for a while.

Additionally Carpark North also has plenty to offer live and anyone who has seen them can attest to this. It is simply an amazing experience to witness Carpark North and the unique energy and passion that the band takes with them onstage every time. And the experience is certainly not reduced by the fact that Carpark North is the source of many hits that the audience can sing along to at concerts.

In 2013 the newest material from Carpark North was released, in the shape of a fourth album, where the song '32' featuring Stine Bramsen is rising in the charts. There are lots of things to look forward to.
events.danishDescription:
Carpark North er nok Danmarks bedste og mest energiske electro-rockband. Carpark North byder på stærke, iørefaldende og nærværende numre fra tre meget gennemførte plader, hvor det seneste hedder ”Grateful”. De fleste husker sikkert, da Carpark North sparkede døren ind til den danske musikscene med storhittet “Transparent And Glasslike” tilbage i 2003. Et hit, som Carpark North i dag kan notere som ét blandt fire andre uundgåelige hits på P3 gennem tiden.

Carpark North har også masser at byde på live. Det kan alle, der har oplevet dem, skrive under på. Det er ganske enkelt bare en fantastisk oplevelse at overvære Carpark North og den helt enestående energi og passion, bandet tager med på scenen hver eneste gang. Og så trækker det jo bestemt ikke ned, at bandet står bag så mange store hits, at publikum kan synge med til koncerterne.

I 2013 kom der nyt materiale fra Carpark North, da det fjerde album kom på gaden. Lige nu storhitter de med ”32” feat. Stine Bramsen. Der er masser at glæde sig til.

events.description: There is DJ playing in the Sports Hall. Come and enjoy the music!

menuDK.name: Lakserillette toppet med lime marinerede rejer med friske krydderurter. Salat med hele cherrytomater og friske grønne asparges, hertil chili/ingefær dressing.Hertil græskar bolle
Helstegt oksefilet med rosin sauce. Bagte grøntsager med bolchebeder og gulbeder. Små bagte kartofler med krydderurter. Stegte blommer med vanilje

Til forretten serveres et glas hvidvin, og til hovedretten serveres et glas rødvin. Der kan bestilles ekstra vin i S-huset. 1 flaske koster 95,- i forsalg. Vinen vil blive leveret under forretten. Drikkevarer kan også købes i barerne på aftenen. På aftenen koster 1 flaske vin 120,-. Hvidvin: 2013 Chardonnay, William Cole – Casablanca Valley (Chile). Rødvin: 2012 Comte de Roc Oval – Costieres de Nîmes (Frankrig)

menu.name: Salmon rillette topped with lime marinated shrimp with fresh herbs. Salad with whole cherry tomatoes and fresh green asparagus, served with chili or ginger dressing. Served with pumpkin bun.
Roasted fillet of beef with raisin sauce. Baked vegetables with sweet beets and golden beets. Small baked potatoes with herbs. Fried plums with vanilla.

A glass of white wine will be served with the starter, and a glass of red wine will be served with the main course. Extra wine can be ordered in the S-house. 1 bottle costs 95 kr in presale and 120 kr on the night. The wine will be delivered during the starter. Drinks can also be bought at the bar on the night. White wine: 2013 Chardonnay, William Cole – Casablanca Valley (Chile). Red wine: 2012 Comte de Roc Oval – Costieres de Nîmes (France)

events.name: DJ
events.description: There is DJ playing in the Oticon Hall. Come and enjoy the music!

events.name: Kaka
events.description:
Kaka is Denmarks up and coming dancehall star. Kaka listened to music throughout his child and wrote his first song at the age of 10.  Kaka is well on his way to conquer Denmark with his distinctive flow, his positive energy and a contagious smile and playful approach to life.

Kaka had his debut on the music scene in 2007, live and on Youtube with some very popular clips. He had cooperated with several well-known artists before he chose to go solo.

A large demand for Kakas name on the underground scene announced that soon a new talent would surface. It was in 2011 that Denmark realised a new star had arrived, the same year that Kaka released his first solo  'Mere Energi' (More Energy), as a part of Pharfar and Fresh-I’s Alis Riddim.

At the end of May 2012 Kaka’s first real single ’Bang Bang (Reggaejam)’ was released, as the first release from Donkey Recs. The song was very well received and was played on multiple radiostations in Denmark while rising on both the download and streaming charts.

Kakas debut EP hit the streets in August 2012, with the summer single 'Dansk Dancehall' (Danish Dancehall). If you have listened to the Danish radio in 2013/2014 you have heard ”En sidste Sang” (One Last Song) with Kaka.
events.danishDescription:
Kaka er Danmarks nyeste up-and-coming dancehall stjerne. Kaka brugte al sin tid som barn på at høre musik, og som 10-årig skrev han sin første sang. Kaka er godt i gang med at erobre Danmark med sit karakteristiske flow, hans positive energi, smittende smil og legende lette tilgang til livet. 

I 2007 fik Kaka sin debut på musikscenen, live og på nettet med stærkt populære YouTube klip. Han har samarbejdet med flere velkendte artister før han valgte at gå solo.

Stor efterspørgsel på Kakas navn i undergrunden varslede at et nyt talent snart ville komme frem til overfladen. 2011 blev året hvor Danmark rigtig fik øjnene op for den nye stjerne. Det var også året hvor Kaka havde sin første solo udgivelse ’Mere Energi’ som en del af Pharfar og Fresh-I’s Alis Riddim.

I slutningen af maj 2012 udkom Kaka’s første rigtige single ’Bang Bang (Reggaejam)’, som første udgivelse på Donkey Recs! Sangen blev super godt modtaget og blev straks Ugens Uundgåelige på P3, MAMAs kæledægge på DR Mama og MTV Fresh (powerplay) og steg højt på streaming og download listerne.

Kakas debut EP ramte gaden i August 2012, med sommer singlen 'Dansk Dancehall'. Har du tændt din radio i 2013/2014 har du hørt ’En sidste Sang’ med Kaka.

events.name: DJ
events.description: There is DJ playing in the Oticon Hall. Come and enjoy the music!

events.name: Kongsted
events.description:
Andreas Kongsted, better known as KONGSTED, Danmarks new star on the DJ, has been nominated for the award 'Best Danish Club DJ Of The Year' for four years in a row, as the first Dane ever, and has won in 2010 and 2011. In 2013 KONGSTED was nominated as 'Danish DeeJay of the Year', a title that is not to be mistaken.

Over the last 4 years KONGSTED has produced a sea of solid singles, for example: 'Mardi Gras', 'The Spirit', 'Good Times' and 'Live Your Life'. His latest achievement is first a gold and later a platinum certification of his latest single 'Chuck Norris'.

With his unique ability to understand an audience, KONGSTED creates an euphoric mood, a mood that is supported by a wide choice of music with a foundation in the house genre and delivered with sublime technical skills ready for the dance floor.

KONGSTED is at this time the tenth most streamed artist in Denmark.
events.danishDescription:
Andreas Kongsted, nærmere kendt som KONGSTED, Danmarks nye stjerneskud på DJ scenen, har som den første danske DJ nogensinde formået at blive nomineret til prisen som Årets Danske Mainstream DeeJay fire år i træk og har vundet i 2010 og 2011. I 2013 var Kongsted nomineret til Årets Danske Deejay - en titel, som ikke er til at tage fejl af!

Igennem de sidste fire år har han KONGSTED produceret et hav af solide singler, bla.: “Mardi Gras”,  “The Spirit”, ”Good Times” og ”Live Your Life” .

Nyeste præstationer fra Kongsted er først en guld og senest en platin certificering af hans nyeste single 'Chuck Norris'.

Med sin unikke evne til at forstå et publikum, skaber Kongsted en euforisk stemning, en stemning der er underbygget af et bredt musikvalg med fundamentet i house genren og leveret med sublime tekniske færdigheder for dansegulvet.

Kongsted er på nuværende tidspunkt den 10. mest streamede artist i Danmark.

events.name: ABBAtizers
events.description:
The ABBAtizers is composed of 6 dedicated members who, with a twinkle in their eye, have devoted their life to stopping time and beaming us all back to the 70s and ABBAs heyday.

In The ABBAtizers fantastic universe, it is a world where Agnethas eyes have never been bluer and the plateau boots have never been as tight. The ABBAtizers celebrate disco and challenge anyone with even a modicum of rhythm. They play the seats out of their tight fitting satin pants with humor, style and great respect for the originals.

The ABBAtizers will take their audience on a musical journey through all of ABBAs great compositions, and they hold nothing back. The show is performed with great attention to detail, so both ABBA lovers and previously uninitiated will get the best experience.

Flower Power Rules...
events.danishDescription:
The ABBAtizers består af 6 dedikerede personer der med et glimt i øjet har viet deres liv til at standse tiden og beame os alle tilbage til 70ernes guldalder og ABBAs storhedstid.

I The ABBAtizers fantastiske univers møder man en verden hvor Agnethas øjne har aldrig været mere blå og plateaustøvlerne strammer de helt rigtige steder.

The ABBAtizers hylder discoen og udfordrer alle med bare et minimum af rytmesans. Med humor, stil og stor respekt for originalen spiller de kort sagt r….ud deres lidt for tætsiddende satinbukser.

The ABBAtizers tager publikum på en musikalsk rejse gennem alle de store ABBA kompositioner og de holder sig ikke tilbage: showet gennemføres helt ud i detaljen så både ABBA elskere og hidtil uindviede får en maksimal oplevelse.

Flower Power Rules….

events.description:
Les Lanciers is danced several times during the evening, both in the Hall and in the Tent.

Les Lanciers is a Square, or a Quadrille, which is the term for a set dance performed by four couples. It is a composite dance made up of five figures of tours, each performed four times so that all couples will dance the lead part. We find Les Lanciers in many variants in several countries, though its popularity waned at the beginning of the twentieth century. It has survived as a popular dance only in Denmark, where it has now been danced in an unbroken tradition of almost 140 years, with its own distinctive music and choreography.

In Denmark, Les Lanciers is danced at court, at many university and school graduations, and at countless private functions. Les Lanciers is also taught in most Danish high schools.

The five tours of the Danish dance are: La Dorset, La Victoria, Les Moulinets, Les Visites, Les Lanciers. 

Introductory dance classes are available before the Commemoration Party, if Les Lanciers is a new acquaintance or if you just like to refresh your steps.
Classes (in English) in Les Lanciers in the Oticon Hall Tuesday May 6th (at 16.30) and Thursday May 8th (at 17.15). Free access.
events.danishDescription:
Lanciers bliver danset flere gange i løbet af aftenen, både i Hallen og Teltet.

Les Lanciers danses i en kvadrille, d.v.s. som en dans udført af 4 par. Les Lanciers er en sammensmeltning af en række kontradanse til én dansesuite, med 5 ture i alt. Les Lanciers findes mange forskellige steder i mange forskellige afskygninger, men dansens poplaritet faldt i begyndelsen af det 20. århundrede I Danmark har dansen overlevet i 140 år med sin egen musik og koreografi.

I Danmark danses Les Lanciers ved hoffet, ved mange universiteter og gymnasier og private fester.

Les lanciers består af fem ture:La Dorset, La Victoria; også kendt som komplimentturen, Les Moulinets; også kendt som damemøllen, Les Visites; også kendt som visitturen, Les Lanciers, også kendt som herremøllen

En hurtig opfriskning af dansen kan klares (på engelsk) i Oticon Salen tirsdag 6. maj (kl. 16:30) og torsdag 8. maj (17:15). Gratis entré.

menuDK.name: Lakserillette toppet med lime marinerede rejer med friske krydderurter. Salat med hele cherrytomater og friske grønne asparges, hertil chili/ingefær dressing.Hertil græskar bolle
Helstegt oksefilet med rosin sauce. Bagte grøntsager med bolchebeder og gulbeder. Små bagte kartofler med krydderurter. Stegte blommer med vanilje

Til forretten serveres et glas hvidvin, og til hovedretten serveres et glas rødvin. Der kan bestilles ekstra vin i S-huset. 1 flaske koster 95,- i forsalg. Vinen vil blive leveret under forretten. Drikkevarer kan også købes i barerne på aftenen. På aftenen koster 1 flaske vin 120,-. Hvidvin: 2013 Chardonnay, William Cole – Casablanca Valley (Chile). Rødvin: 2012 Comte de Roc Oval – Costieres de Nîmes (Frankrig)

menu.name: Salmon rillette topped with lime marinated shrimp with fresh herbs. Salad with whole cherry tomatoes and fresh green asparagus, served with chili or ginger dressing. Served with pumpkin bun.
Roasted fillet of beef with raisin sauce. Baked vegetables with sweet beets and golden beets. Small baked potatoes with herbs. Fried plums with vanilla.

A glass of white wine will be served with the starter, and a glass of red wine will be served with the main course. Extra wine can be ordered in the S-house. 1 bottle costs 95 kr in presale and 120 kr on the night. The wine will be delivered during the starter. Drinks can also be bought at the bar on the night. White wine: 2013 Chardonnay, William Cole – Casablanca Valley (Chile). Red wine: 2012 Comte de Roc Oval – Costieres de Nîmes (France)

events.name: Blå Mandag Jazzband, 1. set
events.description:
Blå Mandag is the name of a seven membered Jazzband, who has played together for 28 years. They write on their homepage that they sing and play to please others, and enjoy it very much themselves.

They enjoy including a bit playfulness in their music, and having played together for many years. They believe they are rather good at making old, funny and traditional New Orleans Jazz, which is easy to dance to.

Their motto is: 'We are there for you', so their most distinguished purpose is to play in honour of their audience and guests so they will have a tremendous experience.
events.danishDescription:
Blå Mandag er navnet på jazzband med syv medlemmer som har spillet sammen i 28 år. Som de skriver på deres hjemmeside, så synger og spiller de for at glæde andre, og nyder det også selv rigtig meget. De elsker at lege mens de spiller, og har spillet sammen i mange år. Blå Mandag Jazzband mener selv de er ret gode til at lave gammel, sjov og traditionel New Orleans Jazz, som er nem at danse til.

 Deres motto er “Vi er der for dig” så deres mål er at spille i ære for vores publikum og gæster, så de får en fanstastisk oplevelse.”
